data.title: Alexandra Stevenson - Kids of Famous Athletes
data.meta_description: Another NBA superstar player who has an incredibly entertaining child is Julius Erving. His daughter with sportswriter, Samantha Stevenson, has made a name …
data.text:
John Edward Thomas Moynahan

John Edward Thomas Moynahan is the son of football quarterback, Tom Brady, and actress, Bridget Moynahan. Brady has won six Super Bowls and four Super Bowl MVP awards. Due to his various accomplishments, he is viewed as the greatest quarterback in the history of NFL. His active career with the New England Patriots spans for 19 years and counting.

If John pursues his father’s legacy in the future, we have no doubt that he will be the next football superstar. John has younger half-siblings (Benjamin and Vivian) as his father went on to marry famous supermodel, Gisele Bundchen. “I love him [John] the same way as if he were mine. I already feel like he’s my son, from the first day,” Gisele said of John.

Sam Alexis Woods

Sam Alexis Woods is the sibling of Charlie and daughter to world-famous golfer, Tiger Woods, and Swedish model, Elin Nordegren. She was named “Sam” because Tiger’s father often called him Sam when he was young. Unlike her brother, who displays golf skills like a pro, Sam enjoys playing soccer more.

Although their parents divorced after a big scandal due to Tiger’s publicized infidelity, Sam and Charlie spend quality time with their father and mother as much as possible. What can we say, these kids are born to love sports just like their famous father, who surpassed various challenges to excel in his chosen career.

Simone Alexandra Johnson

Simone Alexandra Johnson is the 15-year-old daughter of actor and retired professional wrestler, Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson. The young woman turned heads after accompanying her celebrity daddy on the red carpet for the People’s Choice Awards. Just one look at the photo and truly, anyone will be stunned with her beauty and charming presence.

Dwyane revealed that Simone is fond of imitating his wrestling catchphrases, taking loving digs at him by saying things like “do you smell what The Rock is cooking?” Are we seeing a future actress in Simone? Let’s wait for her shining glory as The Rock’s lovely daughter is bound to unleash more of her talent in no time.

Earvin III Johnson

Son to the legendary basketball player, Magic Johnson, Earvin Johnson III, better known as EJ, rose to fame after his notable appearance on E’s reality television series, Rich Kids Of Beverly Hills. Despite the brief run of the show, his popularity earned him his own spin-off, titled EJNYC.

The young TV personality and socialite is known for his androgynous style in fashion and is friends with Tiffany Trump, Kyra Kennedy, and Andrew Warren. With his bold and witty personality, we won’t be surprised to see him make it big in no time. Keep doing you, Earvin! Your father must be truly proud of your accomplishments.

Jasmine Jordan

Who doesn’t know the greatest basketball player of all time? Of course, we all do! Michael Jordan played for 15 seasons in NBA and was one of the instrumental players who popularized the NBA across the world during the 1980s and the 1990s. Although he retired from playing, he is still active in the popular sport as he currently serves as the chairman and owner of the Charlotte Hornets.

Michael Jordan has three children with former wife, Juanita Vanoy; and his daughter, Jasmine, has an eye for sports, just like her father. Jasmine earned her bachelor’s degree in sports management from Syracuse University and currently works as Nike’s field marketing representative.

Tanita Strahan

Michael Strahan is a former NFL player who spent 15 years with the New York Giants as defensive end. Following his retirement from football, Michael became a media personality. He currently serves as a football analyst on NFL Sunday, and he also co-hosts ABC's Strahan and Sara.

Strahan also used to work with Kelly Ripa (from 2012 to 2016) on the daytime talk show, Live! with Kelly and Michael, which earned him two daytime Emmy awards. The popular athlete and host is also a proud family man who fathered four children: Tanita, Isabella, Sophia, and Michael Jr. His eldest child, Tanita, attended high school and college in Texas, the hometown of her father.

Sydney Simpson

Sydney Brooke is the daughter of O.J. Simpson and Nicole Brown. She and her brother, Justin, have been trying their best to live a private life following the controversial case of his parents that brought emotional, physical and financial strain to their family.

Orenthal James (O.J.) is a former NFL running back and actor who gained worldwide fame due to his arrest for the murder of his wife and her friend, Ron Goldman. His case was considered as the “trial of the century.” Simpson’s celebrity status and the fact that the trial was televised contributed to the media circus that surrounded the proceedings. He was released from prison on October 1, 2017.

Christiana Barkley

Charles Barkley is a retired NBA player whose decorated career was prominent in the 1990s. His appearance earned him an appearance in the movie, Space Jam, along with the legendary Michael Jordan. Charles currently serves as an analyst on the postgame show, Inside the NBA.

Barkley’s daughter, Christiana, is viewed as an online sensation. By way of proof, simply take a look at her Instagram account and her huge fan-base that constantly checks her feed for their daily fix of photos and videos about her lifestyle, family and other personal-related activities. All grown-up, we won’t be surprised if Christiana will soon enter show business or modelling. This girl has what it takes: beauty, wit and confidence.

Myla Rose & Charlene Riva Federer

Roger Federer is currently ranked no. 7 worldwide in men’s singles tennis. His versatility in playing tennis and amazing footwork earned him 20 Grand Slam singles titles. He married former professional tennis player, Miroslava Federer, and had their identical twin girls, Myla Rose and Charlene Rivka, in 2009.

The couple’s second set of twins, this time boys, were born in May 2014. Federer said in an interview that he will not push any of his children into playing tennis, and instead he will let them choose and play any sport they truly like. These adorable kids are so lucky for having a superstar and kind dad. And we kinda think it’s an achievement in and of itself to have not one but two sets of identical twins!

Jerry Rice Jr.

Apparently, Jerry Rice Jr. is the son of Jerry Rice, a former NFL wide receiver for the San Francisco 49ers. Jerry Rice played for 20 seasons and holds accolades like being ranked 2nd in “Football’s 100 Greatest Players” and the “Greatest Player in NFL History.”

Jerry Rice senior’s 25-year-old son with former wife, Jacqueline Mitchell, Jerry Rice Jr., is a graduate of UCLA and was eligible to play immediately after transferring to the University of Nevada, Las Vegas. He also played as a wide receiver for the Rebels and was signed by the Washington Redskins as an undrafted free agent in 2014.

Shareef O’Neal

History is set to repeat itself as Shareef O’Neal is gearing towards becoming his father, Shaquille O’Neal’s modern version. Shareef plays as a power forward on his high school basketball team. His amazing playing skills have earned him numerous scholarship offers from various universities with the best basketball programs like UCLA, Georgetown, Baylor and UCLA.

Shaquille is a retired NBA player with a stunning portfolio that includes three Finals MVP Awards and three NBA All-Defensive Team selections. With his son’s current performance in basketball, we have no doubt that Shareef will steal the spotlight in no time. Did we mention that he also got his towering height from his father? It definitely runs in the genes.

Brooke Hogan

Brooke Ellen Bollea, better known by her stage name Brooke Hogan, is a television star and singer. She starred in the reality series, Brooke Knows Best, that followed the ups and downs of her life. Her single, “About Us,” has reached the Billboard Hot 100 chart.

Hogan is the daughter of retired professional wrestler, Hulk Hogan. He was dubbed as “the most recognized wrestling star worldwide and the most popular wrestler of the 1980s." Hogan is also a famous TV personality and musician. He has starred in various films and television shows such as No Holds Barred, Mr. Nanny, and Hogan Knows Best, among others.

Kiyan Anthony

Kiyan Anthony is the only child of NBA player, Carmelo Anthony, and actress, La La Anthony. Carmelo, a small forward for the Houston Rockets is a famed athlete with an impressive recognition as a 9-time NBA All-Star. 12-year-old Kiyan seems set to follow his father’s legacy in basketball as he is actively engaged in the New York Gauchos basketball program in New York City.

Kiyan also appeared in a Jordan-brand sneaker commercial alongside his famous father. Now, we have a mini-version of Carmelo and we’re holding out hope for him to become a brand new basketball superstar in no time. Indeed, these skills run in the blood. There’s no denying that.

Brooklyn Beckham

Son to super couple, David and Victoria Beckham, Brooklyn exudes style and fame just like his famous parents. He pursues his passion in photography and is often spotted hanging out with celebrity kids, Jack Scott Ramsay and Rocco Ritchie.

Brooklyn’s father, David Beckham is a retired pro-footballer and became the first English player to have won league titles in four countries: England, France, Spain and the United States. Victoria Beckham, famously known as Posh Spice of the pop group, “The Spice Girls,” is now recognized as a style icon and fashion designer. That said, it’s no wonder Brooklyn always looks dashing. We hope he’ll consider carrying on his dad’s legacy and playing football soon (fingers crossed).

Matthew Kerrigan

Matthew Kerrigan is the eldest child of former figure skater, Nancy Kerrigan. Matthew and his two other siblings know how to skate and are also engaged with other activities. Their mother was elected into the US Figure Skating Hall of Fame but perhaps more memorable than her international recognition and numerous titles and awards was the attack that she suffered in 1994.

Nancy was walking through a corridor after her practice when Shane Stant, friend of fellow competitor Tonya Harding’s ex-husband, hit her right leg with a police baton. Tonya pleaded guilty of the attack and Nancy has since moved on. In fact, she resumed with her intensive training after recovering from the traumatic incident.

Alexandra Stevenson

Another NBA superstar player who has an incredibly entertaining child is Julius Erving. His daughter with sportswriter, Samantha Stevenson, has made a name for herself in the world of sports. Young Alexandra Stevenson made her tennis debut back in 1999 at Wimbledon.

Alexandra was previously named in the top 20 best singles players and was often pitted against the greatestest tennis players, like Serena Williams, Mary Pierce, and Monica Seles, among others. Stevenson graduated with a degree in sociology from the University of Colorado. Isn’t it amazing that she graduated with honors while playing professional tennis at the same time. Such a pro, isn’t she?

Zaire Blessing Dwyane Wade

The Miami Heat’s all-time leader in points, shots, and steals, Dwyane Wade, has three sons: Zion Malachi Airamis Wade, Zaire Blessing Dwyane Wade, and Xavier Zechariah Wade. The 14-year-old Zaire is obviously living his dream and his father’s to be a basketball star, too.

The six foot tall youngster made his famous father proud when he pulled off a great move against Tim Hardaway Jr. in a Miami Pro League game in July 2018. Recognized as a three-time NBA champion and Most Valuable Player in 2006, it’s obvious that Dwyane passed his playing skills to Zaire which are impressively delivered by his son.

Zeke Thomas

Another kid of an ultra famous athlete is Zeke Thomas. His father is Isiah Thomas III, a retired basketball player who was named as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History and a 12-time NBA All-Star. Any son with a father like Isiah would be expected to pursue the same passion in the field of basketball, but Zeke chose a different path.

Zeke is, in fact, a successful DJ with regular gigs in New York, Miami and Las Vegas. His expertise in DJing, and of course, his father’s connection with basketball earned him a spot as the official DJ of an NBA All-Star game. We appreciate Zeke’s pursuit of happiness in a world where he truly belongs.

Amir Tyson

Amir Tyson is the son of world-famous boxer, Mike Tyson from his second marriage. After graduating from St. Andrew's Episcopal School, Amir pursues his college education at the American University in Washington, D.C. where he plays baseball.

In 2016, Amir appeared in a Super Bowl commercial featuring him as a boxer and his father, Mike as his trainer. This ad may well be turned into a reality. Pro-boxer that he is, with various accolades under his belt, Mike can greatly help Amir in becoming one if he so chooses. Mike Tyson was nicknamed “Kid Dynamite” and “Iron” due to his ferocious style in boxing and his intimidating behaviour both in and out of the ring.

Jarret Payton

Jarrett Walter Payton is a former football running back for the Toronto Argonauts (2009) and Chicago Slaughter (2010-2012). Jarrett is the son of Walter Payton, a former NFL running back for the Chicago Bears for 13 seasons. His skillfulness with touchdowns, carries, and many other categories earned him enviable success in his football career.

Although Jarrett hasn’t had quite the colorful portfolio his father enjoyed, he has proficiency in many more fields than football, like recording music and managing his foundation that promotes anti-bullying through football. In 2015, he also served as a sports reporter for WGN-TV. He got it from his daddy—versatility at its finest!

Antron Pippen

Aside from Sophia Pippen, Scottie Pippen’s son from his previous marriage is also making a name for himself. Antron Pippen plays basketball too but not in the NBA. However, we’re sure he and his father are dreaming of a slot for him in the world-famous basketball association anytime soon.

Scottie is one of the legendary basketball players of the NBA during the ‘90s and his performances with the Chicago Bulls was nothing short of stunning. He was named eight consecutive times to the NBA-All Defensive First Team and as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History. That said, we hope Anton will make it big too. What are we saying, of course he will!

Robin Borg

Björn Rune Borg is a celebrated world champion tennis player. He was widely regarded as one of the greatest players in the history of tennis. With 11 Grand Slam and 15 Grand Prix Super Series titles, he truly deserves his international recognition and huge fan base. Perhaps the best thing about his achievements is that his son, Robin, also inherited his passion and talent for tennis.

The young Borg plays at the University of Wisconsin, Whitewater while pursuing his advertising degree. Bjorn must be thrilled and proud that his son is fueled with determination to be the next tennis superstar. Way to go, Robin!

Trevor Gretzky

Wayne Douglas Gretzky is a retired professional hockey player and head coach. Nicknamed “The Great One,” he played for 20 seasons in the NHL and was considered as “the greatest hockey player ever.” Wayne has five children with actress, Janet Jones, namely Paulina, Ty, Trevor, Tristan, and Emma.

Ty played hockey but eventually quit the sport while Trevor is a former minor league baseball player. He hasn’t made it yet to the pros but we have faith that he’ll get there eventually. With his legendary father as his coach, we’re confident that Trevor will get to his dream field and start taking out his dream awards.

Charlie Woods

When you’re a child to one of the world’s most popular athletes, expect to be a favorite subject among the media, fans and sports analysts. In the case of Charlie Woods, his parents, golfer Tiger Woods, and former model, Elin Nordegren, have nothing to worry about. Charlie, who is now 10-years-old, seems to already be a pro in playing golf.

In 2016, when he was just seven years old, Charlie bagged 2nd place in the U.S. Kids Golf Boys 7 event, held in Palm Beach, Florida. What else can we expect with this talented kid? The younger Woods seems set to create a successful career of his own in the near future.

Kelly Christina Nascimento

Daughter to legendary soccer player, Edson Arantes do Nascimento, better known as Pelé, Kelly Cristina Nascimento found success, not on the football field, but in the entertainment industry. The 50-year-old actress is also a talented singer and founded the former Walkabout Theater Company in Manhattan.

Kelly’s father is considered as one of the greatest soccer players of all time. He was voted World Player of the Century in 1999 and stunned a lot of famous figures. “My name is Ronald Reagan, I'm the President of the United States of America. But you don't need to introduce yourself, because everyone knows who Pelé is," former president Ronald Reagan greeted Pelé when he arrived at the White House.

Maximilian Ibrahimovic

When you are the son of the “third best football player in the world,” the pressure must be crazy high to excel in the same sport. Thankfully, Zlatan Ibrahimovic’ son, Maximilian Ibrahimovic, is a natural in showcasing his football skills as he currently plays for the PSG youth academy.

Zlatan is a Swedish football player who has a decorated career with 31 trophies thanks to his versatility and powerful striking ability. He currently plays as a forward for the LA Galaxy and is considered as “one of the best strikers in the game.” That said, we can’t wait for Maximilian to have his turn and shine bright on the field when the new generation of players takes over.

Ryan Ripken

Cal Ripken Jr., nicknamed “The Iron Man,” is considered as one of the best baseball players of all time. He played 21 seasons for the Baltimore Orioles, was a recipient of MVP awards, and was a 19-time All Star. That said, his son Ryan Ripken is catching up to match or exceed his father’s decorated career.

Ryan is also a baseball player and was drafted by the Orioles in the Major League Baseball amateur draft in 2012. However, at this time he made the decision to pursue his education instead, at the University of South Carolina. In 2017, he inked a deal with the Orioles and played for the Aberdeen Ironbirds.

Laila Ali

Laila Ali is a former professional boxer who held multiple titles from the WBC, WIBA and IBF. Such accomplishments of Laila are no surprise as she is the daughter of Muhammad Ali, considered to be one of the greatest boxers of all time.

Laila started boxing when she was 18 years old after watching a Christy Martin fight. When she told her father about her plans of boxing professionally, Muhammad was not happy due to the dangers of the combat sport. Any father would do his best to protect his daughter, but then Laila fought for her dreams and triumphed in the end. Of course, her father must have been proud of her.

Cristiano Ronaldo Jr.

Team captain of the Portugal national team, Cristiano Ronaldo is considered by many to be the best player in the world. The famed professional football player became a father at the age of 25 and his firstborn was named after him: Cristiano Ronaldo Jr. It is not clear whether he was born via surrogacy as his father revealed full custody of him and refused to disclose any details about the mother per their agreement.

There were rumors that the mother was given a massive amount of money in exchange for full custody to Cristiano Jr. In an interview, Ronaldo mentioned that in the right time, he will explain to his eldest child the situation with regards to his mother.

Kai Wayne Rooney

Kai Wayne is the eldest child of soccer player, Wayne Rooney, and his wife, Coleen Rooney. Wayne is an English footballer who serves as the captain for Manchester United and the England national team. He was named as England’s Player of the Year four times due to his incredible football skills.

Wayne’s son Kai seems to follow his father’s passion in football as the young Rooney has been training with Manchester United’s development team since late 2016. Interestingly, Kai is often spotted practicing and doing drills with his famous father. That said, we can’t help but foresee him as a future football superstar. We’re sure even Wayne is dreaming and hoping for this to happen.

Peyton & Eli Manning

It’s safe to say that the Manning family was predestined to NFL royalty. Cooper, Peyton and Eli played as NFL quarterbacks. While Elli is still active as a quarterback for the New York Giants, Peyton retired in 2016 after playing for 18 seasons and leaving an impressive portfolio in NFL. Hailed as one of the greatest quarterbacks of all time, Peyton’s list of recognitions are truly amazing and include winning two Super Bowls.

Cooper, the oldest of the siblings, is currently hosting Fox Sports program, The Manning Hour. Apparently, the talented siblings inherited their looks and football skills from their father, Archie Manning, a former NFL quarterback for 13 seasons.

Jasmyn Wilkins

Gerald Wilkins is a retired NBA player. In his 14 years (1985-1999) as a basketball player, he served as a shooting guard to various teams such as the New York Knicks, the Cleveland Cavaliers, the Vancouver Grizzlies, and the Orlando Magic. Gerald is the younger brother of Atlanta Hawks player, Dominique Wilkins, dubbed as one of the best dunkers in NBA history.

Gerald has a beauty queen daughter in Jasmyn Wilkins who was crowned as Miss Georgia USA 2012 and as fourth runner up in Miss USA 2012. She has a brother, Damien Wilkins, who currently plays for the NBA development league as a guard and a forward.

Bronny James

Often considered as the best basketball player in the world, LeBron James continues to deliver with excellence in NBA. The icon of modern basketball is a recipient of four MVP awards, two Olympic Gold medals and the list goes on.

Lebron’s 12-year old son, Bronny, seems to be predestined for the basketball court as he is already showing amazing talent in the sport. Although LeBron is happy that he has naturally passed his playing skills to his son, he is not in a hurry to pass on his fame due to fear of the effects of public scrutiny. “My son is going to be a kid as long as he can be. That’s all he needs to worry about,” he said.

Rachel Bradshaw

Rachel Bradshaw is the daughter of former Hall of Fame and NFL quarterback Terry Bradshaw and family attorney Charla Hopkins. Terry’s 13-year long career with the Pittsburgh Steelers showcased his strong performance as a supremely valuable player. A four-time Super Bowl champ, Terry is also an actor with notable appearances in television shows, commercials and films, including Hooper, and The Cannonball Run among others.

Although his daughter Rachel’s chosen career is not sports-related, the lovely country singer was married to NFL placekicker, Rob Bironas, who played for the New York Dragons and the Tennessee Titans. At least she’s still connected to the sport. Unfortunately, her husband died in a tragic car accident.

Joseph Baena

Did you know that actor and former governor of California, Arnold Schwarzenegger, has a secret love child? In fact, his controversial child with their family’s housekeeper caused the end of his 25 years of marriage with then wife, Maria Shriver, niece of former president John F. Kennedy.

Born in 1997, Joseph Baena was hidden until 2011, when the press discovered his real identity. It took seven years for Arnold to discover that he was Joseph’s father when he “started looking like him.” Indeed, Arnold’s genes were so strong that it cannot be denied that John is his son. Baena was born just a few days after Shriver gave birth to her youngest child with Arnold. Awkward!

Dalma Maradona

Diego Maradona is a retired Argentine football player and coach. Many writers, players and fans of the sport view him as one of the greatest football players of all time. Diego has fathered five children and he maintains a close relationship with them, especially his eldest daughter, Dalma, who spent her childhood with him.

Dalma has grown to be a lovely woman. The 29-year-old daughter of the legendary football player earned a name for herself as an actress and singer and has appeared in various television shows and movies. We’re sure Diego must be very proud of his lovely daughter, especially with all her hard-earned achievements.

Sophia Pippen

Scottie Pippen was a key figure in the NBA during the 1990s. As one of the star players of the Chicago Bulls, along with Michael Jordan, he helped their team achieved championship and popularity. Pippen is still considered as one of the greatest defenders to ever play the game.

Now that he’s retired, his children are taking their turns in the spotlight. His daughter with wife Larsa Younan, Sophia Pippen, is now becoming a social media star. Although young, Sophia’s pretty looks and towering height will land her a brighter future, and with a dad like Scottie, we’re sure brighter things are in store for her future.

Allen Iverson II

Allen Iverson II is the son of former NBA star, Allen Iverson. Iverson senior retired in 2013 but left an impressive legacy in the basketball world. In his 14 seasons in the NBA, he played both shooting guard and point guard positions. He was an 11-time NBA All-Star and a recipient of an MVP award in 2001.

Despite talks of his financial struggles, Iverson denied experiencing any money issues in an interview. "That's a myth. That's a rumor... The fact that I'm struggling in any part of my life," he said. Iverson has nothing to worry as his lifetime deal with Reebok pays him $800,000 every year.

Nate Montana

Another kid of a famous athlete who’s following in his parent’s footsteps is Nate Montana. Nate is the son of “The Comeback Kid,” aka Joe Montana, and is a professional football quarterback just like his father. Currently a free agent in the NFL, we hope Nate will score big in his career in no time.

This is not impossible as his father is a four-time Super Bowl Champ and was inducted into the Football Hall of Fame. The list of his impressive recognitions is lengthy but one thing’s for sure, Nate has the best football coach anyone could dream of. Lucky you, Nate.

Enzo Zidane

Enzo Zidane is the eldest son of French soccer star Zinedine Zidane and his wife, former dancer and model, Véronique Zidane. Zinedine is considered one of the best players and most successful coaches in history and was a force to be reckoned with on the pitch back in his day as an attacking midfielder.

Enzo was named after Enzo Francescoli, a Uruguayan soccer player who Zinedine greatly admired. Sure enough, Enzo is living up to that name as a budding soccer star himself.

Lexie Gerrard

Lexie Gerrard is the daughter of British soccer manager and former player Steven Gerrard, and his wife, model Alex Curran. Gerrard was a fierce central midfielder and even captained the English national team, ultimately retiring from playing soccer in 2016.

Since 2017, he's managed a few big clubs, most notably Aston Villa, from 2021-2022. Lexie isn't much of an athlete herself, instead taking after her mom by starting a career as a fashion model.

Joel Beckenbauer

Joel is the son of the legendary German soccer player and manager Franz Beckenbauer.

Franz is considered one of the greatest players in the history of soccer and is the only player to have won the World Cup as both a manager and player. He was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame in 1998.

Young Joel boasts nearly 30k Instagram followers, who enjoy watching him travel and play golf.

Christian Cannavaro

Christian Cannavaro is the son of the Italian soccer coach and former star player, Fabio Cannavaro and his wife, Daniela Arenoso. The older Cannavaro captained the Italian national team that won the 2006 FIFA World Cup. In 2009, he took the title of the most-capped player in Italy's history.

Christian is making his own name as a soccer player for an Italian club. No doubt his drills at home dwarf that of his teammates.

Théo Zidane

Théo Zidane is the son of French soccer legend, Zinedine Zidane and his wife, Véronique Zidane. Like father like son, Théo is a soccer player and even plays Midfielder, just like his dad did. Théo has some big shoes (or, cleats) to fill — Zinedine is world-renowned as one of the greatest players of all time.

The likeness doesn't stop there. Zinedine spent some years playing for Real Madrid and managed the team from 2013 to 2021. Now, his son Théo plays for Real Madrid's reserve team.

Chanel Totti

Chanel is the daughter of Italian soccer player Francesco Totti and his wife, model Ilary Blasi. Totti is held as one of the best Italian players of all time. He famously only played for one club, Roma, in his entire senior career of 24 years.

Chanel is the spitting image of her mom, and her beautiful looks have gained her a huge social media following. Still, she has been and always will be a daddy's girl.

Cruz Beckham

Cruz Beckham is the son of English soccer icon David Beckham, and his wife, fashion mogul and former singer, Victoria Beckham. Beckham captained the British national soccer team for six years and won 19 trophies throughout his 20-year-long professional career. In 2013, he was the highest-paid soccer player in the world.

Cruz isn't going to be a soccer star like his dad, instead going after a singing career like his mom, who was famous for being Posh Spice in the girl group, The Spice Girls.

Milan and Sasha Piqué Mebarak

Milan and Sasha are the sons of Spanish soccer player Gerard Piqué and his ex-partner, singer Shakira. Piqué announced his retirement from professional soccer in November 2022, but not without having made a name for himself as one of the best defenders of his generation. Piqué's announcement came just five months after his split from Shakira.

Milan and Sasha have been their dad's number-one supporters, frequently seen on the stands as well as with their dad right after his matches.

Christian Maldini

Christian Maldini is the son of Italian soccer star Paolo Maldini and his wife, Venezuelan former model, Adriana Fossa. Maldini is considered one of the best defenders of all time, and famously only played for one club, AC Milan, throughout his whole career.

He retired in 2009, after 31 tremendous years with AC Milan, only then to become the club's technical director. Christian pursued a career in soccer as well, having spent some time with none other than AC Milan's youth club.

Gemma Rose Owen

Gemma Rose is the eldest child of British soccer striker Michael Owen and his wife, childhood sweetheart, Louise Bonsall. Owen was the youngest player to score 100 goals in the Premier League and is considered one of the best Liverpool players in the club's history.

Gemma Rose is an athlete in her own right with an impressive dressage career. Her love of horses is shared with her father, who took up horse breeding after his retirement in 2013. She also rose to fame by featuring in the hit reality show "Love Island" in 2022.

José Mário Mourinho Jr.

José Jr. is the son of famed Portuguese soccer coach, José Mourinho. Mourinho Sr. is one of the best-renowned managers and coaches in soccer history, having won multiple awards and broken records. Named in 2015 as Portuguese Coach of the Century, Mourinho has spent the past 20 years leading teams to new heights.

José Jr. is a promising coach himself and has gotten praise from his father, who surely knows what he's talking about.

Matilde Mourinho

Matilde Mourinho is the only daughter of Portuguese managing icon José Mourinho and his wife, Matilde Faria. While her father is known the world over for his incredible success as a manager, Matilde isn't so sporty.

Matilde runs her own sustainable jewelry line, which has attracted A-list customers like Kate Hudson and Stormzy. Matilde would often be seen in the stands supporting her dad, and now José is his daughter's number 1 fan.

Noah and Luan Klose

Noah and Luan are the twin sons of German soccer manager and ex-player, Miroslav Klose. Klose is a decorated striker, having scored the most FIFA World Cup goals ever. Klose retired from playing soccer in 2016 and, since then, has managed and coached a number of German soccer clubs.

Klose's boys have accompanied him to multiple matches throughout their life, always cheering their dad on.

Jorge González

Jorge is the son of Raúl González Blanco, a Spanish soccer manager and former player, and his wife, Spanish model Mamen Sanz. Raúl is considered one of Spain's greatest soccer players, and in his career spanning more than two decades, 16 of those years were spent just with Real Madrid. Since 2018, Raúl has managed Real Madrid's youth club.

His kids, including Jorge, share his passion for soccer. Jorge is building up his soccer career with his school's team and has already picked up a few awards.

Elyse Dempsey

Elyse is the daughter of one of America's best soccer players, Clint Dempsey, with his wife, model Bethany Dempsey. At the club level, Dempsey mainly played for British clubs but spent a good amount of time with the US national team as well.

Dempsey is tied for the US's leading goalscorer, and he represented his country in three FIFA World Cups.

Louis Ballack

Louis is the son of legendary German midfielder Michael Ballack and his ex-wife, Simone Ballack. Michael Ballack retired in 2012 and left a legacy as one of Germany's leading goalscorers. He represented Germany in two FIFA World Cups and, in 2002, was one of the key players in advancing the national team to the finals.

Since retiring, Ballack has lent himself to sports broadcasting, giving his professional analysis and punditry to viewers over the years.

Nora Torres

Nora is the daughter of Spanish soccer manager and former player Fernando Torres and his wife, Olalla Domínguez Liste. Torres was a household name throughout his playing career, and his 2011 signing with Chelsea made him the most expensive Spanish player ever.

He retired from playing in 2019 and moved on to managing. So far, Torres has managed Atlético Madrid's U19 team. Little Nora is a bit young to be pursuing a professional career in anything at the moment, but she is an avid supporter of her dad's work.

Lily-Ella Gerard

Lilly-Ella is British soccer manager Steven Gerrard's second daughter with his wife, Alex Curran. Since 2018, Gerrard has managed three British soccer clubs, including one youth club.

Lily-Ella, like her sister, is not going to feature on the pitch anytime soon. Gerrard's daughter is a model and social media influencer. Fans can follow the young socialite around her lavish life, but soccer fans won't find many cameos of Steven.

Emily May Owen

Emily May Owen is the younger daughter of famed British soccer player Michael Owen and his wife, Louise Bonsall. While Owen was Liverpool's youngest goalscorer in the Premier League, Emily May is also making a name for herself in the sporting world at a young age.

Owen's daughter is a competitive sprinter, and he frequently gushes over her achievements. Sport clearly runs in the Owen blood, if you catch our drift.
